name: flomo
title: Simple flomo
description: A quick Flomo input plugin that allows pre-selection of tags and pasting of source references.
author: Lyson

commands.name: simple-flomo
commands.title: Quick Input to flomo
commands.description: This is flomo's quick input command. Here, you can preset tags for quick addition by ticking. Leave blank to show no presets. For users used to adding references to memos, just insert URLs at References, separated by lines or commas, the program automatically formats them beautifully. Also, you can choose to place your tag's position at the front or end of the memo, as per your preference.
